Class netscape.application.MenuBorder 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.Border
           |
           +----netscape.application.MenuBorder
public class MenuBorder
extends Border
The MenuBorder class draws a border around Menus. Checks to see if its Menu is top-level and VERTICAL to draw a simple border.

Constructor.
